channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Capture
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Capture

item.title: CVE-2021-25464|2024-08-03T20:03:05.654Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20capture
item.description: An improper file management vulnerability in SamsungCapture prior to version 4.8.02 allows sensitive information leak.

item.title: CVE-2021-25522|2024-08-03T20:11:27.121Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20capture
item.description: Insecure storage of sensitive information vulnerability in Smart Capture prior to version 4.8.02.10 allows attacker to access victim's captured images without permission.
